price: Yadeε wͻ wͻn akoma mu anaa, anaasε wͻn adwen nnsi wͻn pi, anaasε wͻsuro sε Nyankopͻn ne Ne Somafoͻ no ne wͻn nni no yie? Daabi, saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne abͻneεfoͻ no.
arabic: أَفِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَمِ ٱرۡتَابُوٓاْ أَمۡ يَخَافُونَ أَن يَحِيفَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَرَسُولُهُۥۚ بَلۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afī qulūbihim maraḍun ami ir'tābū am yakhāfūna an yaḥīfa al-lahu ʿalayhim warasūluhu bal ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
